message: Hi, I’m really frustrated because my sofa delivery is late, and I haven’t received any updates.
Hi. Welcome to SofaNest, my name is Chris. I’m so sorry to hear about this, and I completely understand how frustrating it must be.
Before we proceed, let’s run through security. Could you please confirm your reference number?
Thank you. Could you also confirm your email address, please?
It’s john.doe@example.com.
Thank you. And could you confirm your name for me?
It’s John Doe.
That’s all correct. Let me recap: your reference number is 12345-6789, your email is john.doe@example.com, and your name is John Doe. Does that sound right?
Yes, that’s correct.

Thank you. Let’s take a look at what works for you. I see that your 'Harmony' corner sofa was scheduled for delivery on the 26th, but it seems there’s been a delay due to unexpected logistics issues. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused.
That’s not good enough. I’ve been waiting for weeks, and no one even notified me about this delay.

You’re absolutely right to feel this way, and I’m truly sorry for the lack of communication on our part. Have there been any instances where our updates didn’t reach you? Let me escalate this to our delivery team to get an immediate update.
May I also confirm your contact details to ensure you receive timely updates moving forward?
Yes, my phone number is 555-123-4567, and my email is john.doe@example.com.

Thank you for confirming your details, John. I can see they’ve scheduled a new delivery date for December 2nd, and I’ll personally ensure you receive updates about your delivery status via email and phone. Can you give me any additional details about what would make this right for you?
A $50 credit is fine, but I just hope the sofa actually arrives on December 2nd.

I completely understand your concerns, and I’ll personally follow up with the delivery team to ensure everything goes smoothly. I’ll also send you an update the day before delivery to confirm the time window. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all for now. I just hope it arrives on time this time. Thanks for your help.

You’re very welcome, John. Once again, I’m truly sorry for the delay, and I appreciate your understanding. I’ll make sure you’re kept in the loop every step of the way. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
